hotels.title: French Alpine Mountain Luxury at Europe's Highest Ski Resort with Bar, Restaurant & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of alpine luxury in the heart of the French Alps at a five-star retreat, just steps from the snow-covered slopes of Val Thorens. This high-altitude haven offers seriously stylish rooms after hitting the slopes, dive into the heated indoor pool, or melt away the day's adventures in the Finnish sauna. Step outside and you're in the middle of ski heaven with runs right at your doorstep. Part of the massive Les Trois Vallées region, you've got 600km of pristine pistes to conquer before cruising back for après-ski at the cosy Roy Bar or dinner at the delicious Beca Restaurant.
